value:
$WmMPID_ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_F_Normal,Face|$w0|As a professor, I spend most of my
time teaching others. But I believe
I could learn something from you.$k$p

$WmMPID_クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Schemes? Me? I have no idea what
you're talking about! I plan to fight
fair and square, as ever.$k$p

$WmMPID_ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You're a tough opponent, but I refuse
to yield. Do not fool yourself into
believing I will hold back!$k$p

$WmMPID_エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Victory is in sight, Black Eagles.
Do not let up!$k$p

$WmMPID_クロニエ,ch17_38_Clonier_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Now, you vermin... I'll take down
every last one of you!$k$p
